channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ExactMetrics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ExactMetrics

item.title: CVE-2023-0082|2024-08-02T05:02:43.052Z -- unknown -- exactmetrics
item.description: The ExactMetrics WordPress plugin before 7.12.1 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
